promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic butterfly dark-type pokemon with a golden crystal core. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lumigem, a a dynamic basic butterfly dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Push Aside, Fiery Wrath. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "dark" or "Lumigem". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, butterfly-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Lumigem, the Nightwing Flutterer, thrives in cavernous realms. With Push Aside, it clears obstacles, while Fiery Wrath lights up its mysterious habitat.
